zeigen.translation: to show / to demonstrate / to point at
zeigen.preposition: auf + Akk. (when used as to point at)

übernachten.translation: to spend the night / to stay overnight

telefonieren.translation: to talk on the phone / to call (by phone)

suchen.preposition: nach + Dat. (only when it is figurative)

meinen.translation: to mean / to think / to have an opinion
